page.title: 10EDUCATION
page.content: INFANT & JUNIOR There are no schools at all in the area. The young children, from the Llangynhafal and Hendrerwydd areas, attend playgroup and infant and junior school, in the nearby village of Gellifor. Children from the northern end of the area attend school in Llandyrnog. There is also a Welsh primary school at Denbigh, for those who wish their children to learn through the medium of Welsh. SECONDARY. Children of secondary school age go by bus to either Denbigh or Ruthin high schools. FURTHER EDUCATION. There are no colleges of further education in the immediate area, the nearest being at Colwyn Bay or Kelsterton.
